title: Unable to earn Hextech Chests, and Keys due to recent ban
body: GOT BANNED IN AUGUST 2016, but still cant earn loot... Why is that?

replies.body: If you are still being toxic in games the loot restrictions just keeps going.
I sometimes use CAPS but, other then that, not toxic.

*Lew* is on the right track. Essentially, you need to *consistently* display **good sportsmanship** during the reform period in order to earn Hextech Loot eligibility back. I recommend checking our [**Hextech Crafting Restrictions FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions) out for more info on how this works.

I hope that clears up the confusion!
